name: Dodge It (Wellzitu)
description:
In pandemic times we have to do our best to keep ourselves alive. Can you avoid the diseases that show up on the screen and live for more than 100 years? Try this simple, but addictive retro game!

Good luck and #StayAtHome

Welliton Souza - Programming, Animation, Art and Design;
Deborah Colombari - Sound Designer, Design and QA;
